lesson: Critiquing and Analyzing Works of Art

example.en: He gave a fair critique of the painting.

words.definition: The act of explaining the meaning of something.

example.en: The viewer gave an interesting interpretation of the artwork.
example.ar: قدم المشاهد تفسيرًا مثيرًا للعمل الفني.

words.definition: The use of symbols to represent ideas.

example.en: The artwork has a strong aesthetic appeal.

words.definition: To assess the quality or value of something.
words.arabic_definition: تقييم جودة أو قيمة شيء ما.

example.en: The teacher asked the students to evaluate the sculpture.
example.ar: طلب المعلم من الطلاب تقييم التمثال.

words.definition: Having or showing skill in the arts.
words.arabic_definition: امتلاك أو إظهار مهارة في الفنون.

example.en: The piece has great artistic value.

words.definition: A state where elements are arranged harmoniously.
words.arabic_definition: حالة يتم فيها ترتيب العناصر بتناغم.

example.en: The balance of color and shape is impressive.

words.definition: The way feelings or ideas are shown.
words.arabic_definition: طريقة يتم بها عرض المشاعر أو الأفكار.

example.en: The expression of emotion in the painting is strong.
example.ar: التعبير عن المشاعر في اللوحة قوي.

words.definition: The main subject of an artwork.

example.en: The theme of the artwork is nature.

words.definition: The process of being creatively influenced.

example.en: The artist found inspiration in the sea.
